name: Tomb of AnuBI0S (itch)
description:
Tomb of AnuBI0S is a tower defense - platformer game where you must protect the machine god RAm from the forces of the undead.

Control the battlefield by placing walls and turrets. Buy Weapons and Upgrades to be better prepared and show those organics who refuse to die who's boss!

21/06 update: QoL changes, optimizations, lots of balance.

21/06 update 2: I got time to add more neon into the game! Also flying enemies that were cut previously.
